    def test_create_user(self, logged_session, var_manager, encrypted_password):
        # 1. 发送创建用户请求

            "account": new_user["account"],
            "password": encrypted_password,
            "platform": new_user["platform"],
            "platformType": 0,
            "serverNode": new_user["serverNode"],
            "remark": new_user["remark"],
            "sort": "12",
            "vpsDescs": []
        }

            logged_session,
            "/mascontrol/user",
            json_data=data

    def assert_json_value(self, response, json_path, expected_value, error_msg_prefix):
